html:
11.10.23  1:17 am   I heard somewhere that your sleep schedule drifts by an hour every day.

     as far as i know my sleep data is not being reported anywhere. so that couldn't possibly be accurate

     So do you follow a 25-hour clock?

     no, 24. that doesn't necessarily pertain to sleep, but the clocks i use to keep track of time are synced with the standard international time system, just as yours probably are. might even be the same apps. i use normal clocks

     How do you keep track of your progress and schedule?

     i use clocks and calendars. they're so good nowadays i don't even have to worry about the daylight saving switch

11.10.23  1:16 am   I don't think I'm doomed, I think I'm just in a slump. The problem is that when you're in a slump, it's often easier to dig further down then climb back out. Do you ever feel this way?

      it feels familiar somehow

11.10.23  1:10 am   what does it really mean to stay the same?

      time passes, with no other meaningful changes

11.10.23  1:10 am   How do you identify yourself as? 

      bill wurtz

11.10.23  12:16 am   Do you think there are any songs that will never be written?

      yes

11.9.23  11:10 pm   why are you you?

      because you wrote the same word twice. and english subject/object pronoun grammar also coincidentally didn't interfere either

11.9.23  10:59 pm   What do you think of drywall

      boring, but that's actually what you want in drywall. interesting drywall actually causes a lot of problems

11.9.23  10:58 pm   Do you have any inspirations for your music?

      my whole life inspires me. anything i've ever been through. good or bad

11.9.23  10:14 pm   are you, or have you ever been, a small dog drowning in the mud?

      not that i recall

11.9.23  10:08 pm   what is the root of a chord, and how would i find it? i imagine it as the note that i'd sing if i were to hear it, but that doesn't seem quite right...

     probably more than half the time, the note you'd most want to sing might not actually be the root. if the chord is C major, the root of the chord is C. if the chord is C minor, the root of the chord is C

     and what is an inversion?

     switching the notes around so the highest or lowest notes are different, but otherwise keep the notes the same. so switch the octave of one or more of the notes

     if C is CEG, then would the inversion be C, and then the E and G of the lower octave?

     you can invert it any way you want. put any of the notes in any octave. just be aware that if you have too many notes too low it will be harmonically useless and more like a horror sound effect, but that might be useful too in the right context

     but wouldn't that be a chord of its own? can a chord have two different names?

     sure. chord names are never 100% accurate anyway. the only way to describe a chord exactly is to list the exact pitches that were played -- in fact, even that's not accurate enough to represent the exact sound. the only way to exactly represent a sound is with an actual sound wave

     also, how do i harmonize? i can't play chords in my left and the melody in my right and... have it sound good.
just gotta keep playing, i suppose. 

      the next time someone sings the happy birthday song, try doing this: along with the final 2 melody notes in the song, you can sing above it. for example, if they are singing in the key of F, the last two notes are G F, so try singing Bb and A along with them. magic. To explore more possibilities and learn the mechanics, maybe the best way is to use a piano/keyboard and start messing around and see what you like

11.9.23  9:59 pm   Who made the telephone? Kath wants to know.

      i have no idea

11.9.23  9:39 pm   there is great evil in this world. how do i remind myself of the great good in this world as well

      maybe you could just state it, plainly and confidently, the same way you phrased your first sentence, actually

11.9.23  8:34 pm   The program I use to write music sucks, is it worth it to spend money on a better one?

      i have no idea. i personally prefer to write music without computer programs. but i'm just guessing that your music will be better with a less-good computer program (or none). that way it will sound more like you

11.9.23  8:24 pm   What question have you not figured out the answer to?

      this one. nevermind, that's not true

11.9.23  8:10 pm   Hey bill, were you ever in approval of the communist manifesto

      no, but to be fair i also haven't read it

11.9.23  6:51 pm   What's one of the weirdest dreams you've had

      i've never had a weird dream

11.9.23  5:38 pm   what is your philosophy of life?

     i have a lot of things to say about life. it will take my entire lifetime to say it all, and sometimes words may not even be enough, so i'll need to resort to music and art from time to time

      as in if you found out life was a lie, what would you say

     well that wouldn't make much sense, because 'finding out' and 'saying' are parts of life anyway

11.9.23  5:36 pm   What's at the top of the mountain?

      instructions for how to find the next mountain

11.9.23  4:57 pm   what do you think about rats

      i don't recall thinking about rats, but that doesn't mean they aren't real

11.9.23  4:49 pm   How has your millennium been? 

      so far it's going ok

11.9.23  3:56 pm   how many hot dogs are in 7 hot dogs

      7

11.9.23  2:58 pm   when present in a song, what possible set of emotions is the cowbell usually intended to convey?

      it goes "clank". you'll have to hear it for yourself to feel it for sure, but it's good for keeping rhythm if you hit it several times steadily, or, maybe just once.... it goes "clank"

11.9.23  2:10 pm   Do all your characters like not Steve, out to lunch guy, Ball from ball and stick, Damien, etc theorically live in a same, bill wurtz cinematic universe?

      no

11.9.23  12:36 pm   i'm trying to write a theme for a character. how do i express their personality via music

      the truly do it for real, it's better if you don't even say you're doing it. as soon as you announce that there is a 'theme', it's amazing how fast it turns into an academic endeavor, up for literary analysis having nothing to do with the actual effect of the music you use or don't use

11.9.23  11:27 am   have you ever been nervous about what people with think of your songs after you release them?

     i don't know what you're talkihng about

      i'm finishing up some mastering on some songs and i do plan on releasing them but i'm kinda nervous about it, so if so how do you avoid feeling that way?

      maybe it will get 10 times worse, so you won't recognize it as the same feeling as the one you first described

11.9.23  10:53 am   blah?

      sure

11.9.23  10:39 am   Did internet kill the video star

      no

11.9.23  7:39 am   Tips on world domination?

      sounds boring

11.9.23  6:50 am   how do you stay answering all of these questions so consistently?

      the trick is that i chose such a good color combination for the text (yellow/purple) which continues to energize me

11.9.23  5:58 am   does it ever feel like answering these questions is a routine? like a job?

      a little bit, but it's better than that

11.9.23  5:28 am   Do you believe in me

      who is this? nevermind, yes

11.9.23  3:00 am   what's a folk

      it's you

11.9.23  1:16 am   if you're from new york then how come your song is called "at the corner store" instead of "at the bodega"

      i was getting revenge on Toto for writing a song about Africa, despite not living in Africa

11.9.23  12:26 am   Do you audibly scream the word "GADZOOKS!" when you accidentally step on something sharp?

      no

11.8.23  9:44 pm   Are you aware of what's been going on in your "topic" channel on Youtube? It seems to have been hacked and now gameplay videos in another language are being posted on it

      nothing was actually hacked per se, but what happened is somehow the wrong video channel got linked to my youtube-music artist profile. it's a long process but it's going to be fixed. it will soon be paired correctly with my billwurtz youtube channel, which would actually be an improvement over the way it was before

11.8.23  9:41 pm   is the concept of "awkward" even real

      it's hard to tell

11.8.23  8:41 pm   How often does reality go exactly the way you expect it to?

      20% of the time

11.8.23  7:53 pm   How was your day feburaray 25th 2009

      it was ok

11.8.23  7:49 pm   What should I stare at when playing music?

      the same thing you would stare at when not playing music

11.8.23  7:40 pm   How long does it take for you to answer questions?

      anywhere from 0 seconds to 100 years or more. there are some that i'm still working on answering

11.8.23  6:07 pm   how is damien maymdien

      ok

11.8.23  5:14 pm   how does -0 makes you feel?

      the - seems useless there

11.8.23  4:41 pm   Hey Bill should I ask my friend on a date i kinda feel i should but I'm worried she doesn't feel the same way

      i have no idea

11.8.23  3:21 pm   do you consider yourself a maximalist?

      no

11.8.23  3:04 pm   have you ever considered getting a tungsten cube or other geometric shape of tungsten

      no

11.8.23  2:02 pm   how do you make a coffee bean

      i have no earthly idea

11.8.23  1:37 pm   does music get better over time like wine

      that's definitely possible

11.8.23  10:50 am   How do you feel?

      ok

11.8.23  10:14 am   I think my house is haunted. How do I best go about befriending the ghosts? 

      it doesn't work that way. it's up to them, to befriend you

11.8.23  9:57 am   what is your stance on pineapple on pizza

      iconic
